Name: Jalisco Flower
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of grapefruit zest twist &/or edible white flowers.
TOP with sparkling wine and briefly stir. (Or pour half the sparling wine into the glass first to help reduce foaming and eliminate need to stir.)
Garnish with grapefruit zest twist &/or edible white flowers.
Review: Subtle, fruity and one of my favourite champagne/sparkling wine cocktails.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2008 by Vincenzo Marianella at Doheny in Los Angeles, USA. (Originally served straight-up in a flute.)
Nutrition: One serving of Jalisco Flower contains 159 calories
